name: Wolf's Gravestone

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases Base ATK by 20%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases Base ATK by 25%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 50% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases Base ATK by 30%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 50% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases Base ATK by 35%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 50% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases Base ATK by 40%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 50% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

description: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.
